channel.title: Shopassistant error
channel.description:
I try to make a special value on the red phat.
so this is what Ive done :
[code]public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { switch (id) { case 1083: //red phat return 350; case 13739: case 1155: case 1117: case 1075: case 1087: case 13035: case 13036: case 1189: //Primal and Korasi return 10000000; case 15037: case 15038: case 15040: case 15313: return 10000000;[/code]
this is what I added :
[code]case 1083: //red phat return 350;[/code]
I dont know why it gives an error ;s.
this is the error : [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2vdpci1.jpg[/img]

item.title: Shopassistant error
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Nick I am Nick
item.description:
@I_am_Nick wrote:

You probably don’t have it set anywhere to sell for its special item value, you can either set that or make the price in the prices file (in source/data/cfg) 350, which should only be done if you don’t want to sell it anywhere for coins.

Read full topic

item.title: Shopassistant error
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

The cost should be in your items config file if I believe so?

Read full topic
